13. THE SCOPE CLOUD IS FOR PROJECT P50196. DURING ADEQUACY CHECK,
REQUIREMENT OF NEW CONDENSATE RECOVERY SYSTEM IS ENVISAGED FOR
UNIT 558 IN GRADE 2 AND UNIT 555. 
14. IN MODIFIED CONDENSATE RECOVERY SYSTEM, CONDENSATE FLOW RATE
FROM UNIT 555 AND UNIT 558 IS ROUTED TO NEW CONDENSATE SYSTEM
WHICH INCLUDES NEW CONDENSATE COLLECTION DRUM (562-V-203), NEW AIR
COOLER (562-E-203) AND NEW CONDENSATE PUMPS (562-P-203A/B).

3.   HMB FOR PROJECT 30201-50196 IS ATTACHED AS AN ANNEXURE TO 
      SIMULATION REPORT RPT-50196-H5-01-00-20-006.
CONDENSATE FROM UNIT 555, ORIGINALLY ROUTED TO GRADE-1 OFFSITE,
IS NOW REDIRECTED TO THE NEW SYSTEM IN GRADE 2 ALONG WITH
CONDENSATE FROM UNIT 558.
THE SCOPE CLOUD IS FOR PROJECT P50196. AN ADEQUACY CHECK   HAS
BEEN PERFORMED FOR CLOUDED PORTION; HOWEVER, NO
MODIFICATIONS ARE REQUIRED IN THE SYSTEM EXCEPT FOR GRADE 1
OFFSITE CONDENSATE COLLECTION PUMPS (562-P-110A/B/C), WHICH
NEEDS TO BE REPLACED WITH NEW PUMPS SINCE THE CALCULATED
PUMP CAPACITY AND HEAD OPERATES OUTSIDE THE EXISTING PUMP'S
PERFORMANCE CURVE
